text: Ezɨ Israelian Atrivim Jehoas, Betsemesɨn nguibar ekiamɨn Judabar Atrivim Amasian suira. Amasia, Atrivim Joasɨn otarim, egha Atrivim Ahasian igiavotarim. Ezɨ gɨn, Atrivim Jehoas Israelian mɨdorozir gumaziba ko, Betsemesɨn nguibar ekiam ategha Jerusalemɨn ghue. Egha me Jerusalem avɨnizir dɨvazir gavgavim gasɨghasɨgha, Efraimɨn Tiar Akamɨn ikegha ghua, Tiar Akar Mɨkebamɨn Itimɨn tu. Dɨvazir kuvizir kamɨn ababanim, a 200 mitan tu.
